title: Highly Recommend!
text: We had Brenton recommended to us to transform our old garage door into a sleek sliding door and I am so glad he was. His attention to detail and workmanship was spot on. He is friendly and approachable and treats you like a mate not just a customer. Would highly recommend him for any door/glass work. Thank you Brenton for giving us our office space.
author: Natelle Ramsey

title: Great work
text: Awesome work done. All finishes and detailing done nicely. Good to see someone taking pride in there works.
author: Narkz Haretuku

title: Professional
text: Very professional service. Brenton was efficient and did a quality job. Would recommend 5.
author: Sahn Anderson

title: Excellent Service!
text: Brenton is very knowledgeable in this trade and efficient in his work. Highly recommend. *****
author: Numea Kapea
